content: this legal text summarizes a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the case involves the distribution of goods and funds with a total value of 5000 eur there are two heirs a daughter and a son and according to the inheritance act each heir initially inherits half of the goods however the daughter has chosen to waive her share allowing the son to inherit the full estate the court determined that the deceased persons estate consists of funds in a personal bank account and a sum of 265523 eur based on a leasing contract the court informed the heirs about the inheritance and requested their declaration within 15 days one heir waived their share and the other accepted it resulting in the acceptance of the entire estate by the heir who accepted the net value of the estate after deducting funeral expenses is 5000 eur the court fee for the case is 189 eur payable by one of the parties the heiress is reminded to obtain a certificate of finality for the succession order and arrange for the transcription of the property within the specified time limit the text also explains the process of filing an appeal including the deadline required documents and payment of the court fee

metadata.relationship_between_parties: daughter and son of the deceased
